author: singh sikandar

text:
For all the people who are  commenting here. This is not ragging . Ask any engineering students who have hostels , celebrate birthdays with cakes , bumps etc.
These are just NIT students who are of same year and there are no seniors in this video. Students are celebrating their birthday with a tradition called birthday bumps where everyone hits birthday guy bums with chappals, legs etc.
The guy who is getting beaten up ( wrong word) is also laughing with joy because of all his classmates and no one is intentionally hurting him. .  ﻿
